main event: On the night of August 6, 1955, witnesses in Old Greenwich, Connecticut reported seeing a bright, circular object in the sky that moved rapidly, hovered, and then shot away at incredible speeds.
interesting points: The object was described as glowing and about the size of a basketball., Multiple witnesses confirmed seeing the object simultaneously., One observer reported it as emitting a bluish-white light., There were no conventional aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting., Investigators later interviewed the witnesses, but found no physical evidence of the object.
witness description: Witnesses included residents and family members who were gathered at the house when the sighting occurred.
